content.html: The slow destruction of Twitter means I don’t have to limit myself to 280 characters anymore. So this is a LONG-ASS post about having been online for decades & lost so many spaces to malfeasance and malice & what to do now. Because I need to scream. catvalente.substack.com/p/stop-talking…
content.value:
The slow destruction of Twitter means I don’t have to limit myself to 280 characters anymore.

So this is a LONG-ASS post about having been online for decades & lost so many spaces to malfeasance and malice & what to do now.

Because I need to scream.

catvalente.substack.com/p/stop-talking…
